title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. B, ch. IV, subch. A, art. 1, subart. A, pt. 610 - Licensing Of Legal Consultants
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. B, ch. IV, subch. A, art. 1, subart. A, pt. 610 - Licensing Of Legal Consultants

State Regulations
§ 610.1 - Applications for licenses as legal consultants; referral to committee on character and fitness
§ 610.2 - Documents, affidavits and other proof required
§ 610.3 - College and law school certificates
§ 610.4 - Exceptional situations
§ 610.5 - Authority of committee on character and fitness to require additional proof
§ 610.6 - Undertaking
§ 610.7 - Disciplinary procedure
§ 610.8 - Filing

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. B, ch. IV, subch. A, art. 1, subart. A, pt. 610

Statutory authority: Judiciary Law, § 53[6]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
